# UIContextMenuInteraction.appearance.compact

**Case**

A nonmodal, compact menu with no preview.

## Declaration

```swift
case compact
```

## Constants

- **UIContextMenuInteraction.appearance.unknown**: No menu appearance.
- **UIContextMenuInteraction.appearance.rich**: A modal menu with an optional preview.

items.description: A modal menu with an optional preview.
items.name: UIContextMenuInteraction.appearance.rich

title: UIContextMenuInteraction.appearance.compact
